entry.title: WIND WARNING , Blanc-Sablon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:33 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Blanc-Sablon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:02 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 7:46 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -4.2°C
Wind: W 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 early this evening then increasing to 60 gusting to 80 near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with flurries. Blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Blowing snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Blowing snow. Wind northwest 70 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight then to 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023
